items.title: A Focused Elon Musk Just Helped Tesla Secure a Record Quarter
items.description: Tesla now sits on a record $41 billion cash pile.

items.title: How to Take Advantage of This Powerful Tax Deduction
items.description: Year after year, Section 179 is still the easiest and best way to save big on your taxes.

items.title: Microsoft Just Invested in a Cement Startup That Turns CO2 Into Literal Building Blocks
items.description: Fortera bolts on their tech to existing cement plants to create a greener product. Here’s why it caught Microsoft’s eye.

items.title: White Collar Workers Are Considering Unionizing as Their Jobs Are Threatened
items.description: Reports suggest more professionals whose jobs are vulnerable to management flattening trends and AI may be ready to organize, though skeptics abound.

items.title: Science Says How You Sleep Affects How You Eat, and Vice Versa: the Virtuous (and Vicious) Cycle of Sleep and Diet
items.description: Getting enough sleep improves your diet. Eating healthier improves your sleep. Why not combine the two?
